original_text: Then Caiaphas tore his clothes to show that he was angry. He said, ‘Jesus has spoken bad words against God. We do not need anyone else to speak against him. You have heard him speak bad words against God.
korean_text: 이에 대제사장이 자기 옷을 찢으며 이르되 그가 신성 모독 하는 말을 하였으니 어찌 더 증인을 요구하리요 보라 너희가 지금 이 신성 모독 하는 말을 들었도다

sentences.original_text: to show that he was angry
Jesus has spoken bad words against God
sentences.korean_translation: 예수가 하나님을 대적하여 나쁜 말을 했다

sentences.original_text: We do not need anyone else
You have heard him speak bad words against God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그가 하나님을 대적하여 나쁜 말하는 것을 들었다
